price: (Noa) kaa sε: ”Me Wura (Nyankopͻn) mafrε me nkorͻfoͻ no anadwo ne adekyeε mu,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
